Text: Liberal. Enough said.. She pushes her thoughts and opinions on others by leading questions and bias information. Such a hypocrite.
Amat loqui de sociali vita, quae aliquando inconveniens. Ludunt ludis omni tempore et non in fossis inveni eos. EGO sentio amo ego didici omnino nihil. Paenitet Mrs Hahn.
Such a biased teacher, tries to brainwash student...Bread not bombs, shove that pin where the sun don't shine.
Can be over opinionated, does not like.to be contradicted about opinions or if she is misinformed continues to insist only on her views.
Your the worst and most borining history teacher i have ever had and i love history. you have ruin this year for me.
his emotional rants preclude any rational discourse. teaching should involve a healthy exchange of ideas, but if you disagree with him, you're belittled... even though he's wrong!
She is very opinionated and does not teach objectively. If you disagree with her, you will struggle in her class.
She was different than the other gym teachers. VERY different. Very colorful. i didn't think she was aware of the dress code at schoold either.
i thought that when you teach art, you make people love it. she does the exact opposite. very uncreavtive and dull.
I hated her class with a passion. Her opinion was the only one allowed in the classroom, and if you didn't agree with it, then you didn't matter.
Dont touch her things, YOU'LL GET GERMS ON THEM! and if you dont want charcole on your silk shirts, then either change shirts or change prfessions! oh, and P.S. YOU NEED MORE DEMENTION!
She presents a highly biased view of history. She should make her courses more balanced. They are too feminist and left-winged now. Take the challenge Ms. Fields!
Ultimately adamant with his own form of teaching. Those who don't adapt to it well fail, period. Funny, but close-minded.
I believe she works us students to death on taks when taks is important yes but sat on the other hand is equally important she focuses way to much on taks.
Has no idea that other religions even exist and he's a HISTORY teacher. Harassing. Demeaning. And serves no purpose other than to bring other christians down. Get in politics, get out of the school.
Do not fear alumni. She never gave me more than an 85 on anything and now I am a published writer! An 85 in her world = 100 in the REAL world!
Has a socialistic political agenda that he tries to sneak into class, which would be fine if he owned up to it.
too much hw n proj. too borin and slow. "you have a ll the time in the world" is just an expression!!!
she is such a weird person. u dont get a good grade unless u share her opinion on things. a teacher is supposed to be open to other ideas.
Does not appreciate greatness, or for that matter eccentricity. Does not understand History is diverse in its intepretation. Should read textbook, and you will be alright.
She made me feel like I wasn't good at art and she didn't appreciate my piece in fashion. didn't really value time we had in class
She doesn't accept any opinion but hers. Proving her wrong is impossible in her eyes. Not very fun or flexible with her units. SWITCH OUT NOW.
She sux. she cant even pronounce terms right. Her information is biased, she forces her religious beliefs on students.Theres a reason 4 sparating church & state
We R chapin... lets get real we have always been chapin and he is not going to change that.. where is a poem for that one??
Very Stubborn women, has lots of favorites and likes only those who view the world she does. ITS ALWAYS HER WAY OR NO WAY AT ALL.
WOW Mrs. Kissinger needs a chill pill. During Civil War studies, she made us shout "Yes sir!" when asked a question and gave us points for how loud we shouted.
She is unfair, and doesnt stick to what she says. She bases her opinion of you on what others say. She is not a nice woman.
Biased. Can't make up her mind about her ideas. Seems to claim that other people are less open minded than her... not true. Not very smart.

I agree with these negative reviews and then some. While other teachers read/teach classics, you get a choice in her class of Flight or The Red Tent, but it doesn't matter because no one reads the books anyway.
